article_title: Watch as Megyn Kelly interviews Paul Ryan about an American Thinker article on him
article_text:
Last night Megyn Kelly interviewed Paul Ryan about his role in facilitating the rise of Donald Trump, based on John Ellis’s article, “Paul Ryan: Donald Trump's Best Friend.”

Here is a video of the encounter:
